languages.text: "Ты не Домин'Теодора!" {n}Взгляд Кибеллы кипит.{/n} "Неумирающий не отпускает от себя души — такова непреложная истина! Ты — воровка имен!"
"You are not Domin'Theodora!" {n}Kibellah's eyes blaze with fury.{/n} "The Undying One does not relinquish the souls that come to Him — such is the absolute truth! You are a thief of names!"
languages.original_text: "Ты не Домин'Теодора!" {n}Взгляд Кибеллы кипит.{/n} "Неумирающий не отпускает от себя души — такова непреложная истина! Ты — воровка имен!"

languages.text: «¡No es Domin'Theodora!». {n}Los ojos de Kibellah arden con furia.{/n} «El Inmortal no libera las almas que acuden a Él. ¡Es una verdad absoluta! ¡Has usurpado su nombre!».
languages.original_text: "You are not Domin'Theodora!" {n}Kibellah's eyes blaze with fury.{/n} "The Undying One does not relinquish the souls that come to Him — such is the absolute truth! You are a thief of names!"

traits.locale_text: «¡No es Domin'Theodora!». {n}Los ojos de Kibellah arden con furia.{/n} «El Inmortal no libera las almas que acuden a Él. ¡Es una verdad absoluta! ¡Has usurpado su nombre!».

languages.text: 「お前はドミン・シオドーラではない！」{n}キベラの目が怒りに燃える。{/n}「不死の者は、御許に来た魂を手放すことはない…それが絶対の真実だ！お前は名を盗んでいるだけだ！」
languages.original_text: "You are not Domin'Theodora!" {n}Kibellah's eyes blaze with fury.{/n} "The Undying One does not relinquish the souls that come to Him — such is the absolute truth! You are a thief of names!"

traits.locale_text: 「お前はドミン・シオドーラではない！」{n}キベラの目が怒りに燃える。{/n}「不死の者は、御許に来た魂を手放すことはない…それが絶対の真実だ！お前は名を盗んでいるだけだ！」

languages.text: “你不是秘者西奥多拉！”{n}绮贝菈的目光充满了怒火。{/n}“不死之神绝对不会放开来到祂面前的灵魂——这是绝对不变的真理！你只是个盗用名字的窃贼而已！”
languages.original_text: "You are not Domin'Theodora!" {n}Kibellah's eyes blaze with fury.{/n} "The Undying One does not relinquish the souls that come to Him — such is the absolute truth! You are a thief of names!"

traits.locale_text: “你不是秘者西奥多拉！”{n}绮贝菈的目光充满了怒火。{/n}“不死之神绝对不会放开来到祂面前的灵魂——这是绝对不变的真理！你只是个盗用名字的窃贼而已！”

languages.text: "Ihr seid nicht Domin'Theodora!" {n}Kibellahs Augen blitzen vor Zorn.{/n} "Der Todlose gibt die Seelen nicht auf, die zu ihm kommen – und das ist die absolute Wahrheit! Ihr seid eine Namensdiebin!"
languages.original_text: "You are not Domin'Theodora!" {n}Kibellah's eyes blaze with fury.{/n} "The Undying One does not relinquish the souls that come to Him — such is the absolute truth! You are a thief of names!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid nicht Domin'Theodora!" {n}Kibellahs Augen blitzen vor Zorn.{/n} "Der Todlose gibt die Seelen nicht auf, die zu ihm kommen – und das ist die absolute Wahrheit! Ihr seid eine Namensdiebin!"

languages.text: « Vous n'êtes pas Domin'Théodora ! {n}La colère embrase le regard de Kibellah.{/n} L'Immortel n'abandonne pas les âmes qui viennent à Lui, telle est la vérité absolue, vile usurpatrice ! »
languages.original_text: "You are not Domin'Theodora!" {n}Kibellah's eyes blaze with fury.{/n} "The Undying One does not relinquish the souls that come to Him — such is the absolute truth! You are a thief of names!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'êtes pas Domin'Théodora ! {n}La colère embrase le regard de Kibellah.{/n} L'Immortel n'abandonne pas les âmes qui viennent à Lui, telle est la vérité absolue, vile usurpatrice ! »

languages.text: "Sen Domin'Theodora değilsin!" {n}Kibellah'nın gözleri öfkeyle alevleniyor.{/n} "Ölmeyen, huzuruna çıkan ruhları terk etmez. Mutlak hakikat böyledir! Sen isimlere el koyuyorsun!"
languages.original_text: "You are not Domin'Theodora!" {n}Kibellah's eyes blaze with fury.{/n} "The Undying One does not relinquish the souls that come to Him — such is the absolute truth! You are a thief of names!"
